thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Enercare Reaches Collective Bargaining Agreement With Unifor Local 975

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Enercare Reaches Collective Bargaining Agreement With Unifor Local 975
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Enercare Inc:
* ENERCARE REACHES COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT WITH UNIFOR LOCAL 975
* ENERCARE INC - UNIONIZED EMPLOYEES HAVE VOTED IN FAVOUR OF NEW THREE-YEAR AGREEMENT EFFECTIVE APRIL 1, 2017
* ENERCARE - AS PART OF AGREEMENT, CO’S UNIONIZED WORKFORCE WILL RECOGNIZE A GENERAL WAGE INCREASE IN YEAR 1 OF 2.0%​
* ENERCARE - ‍AS PART OF AGREEMENT, CO’S UNIONIZED WORKFORCE WILL RECOGNIZE GENERAL WAGE INCREASE IN YEAR 2 OF 2.05%​
* ENERCARE - CO’S UNIONIZED WORKFORCE TO RECOGNIZE GENERAL WAGE RAISE IN YEAR 3 OF 2% MINIMUM TO MAXIMUM OF 2.5% OF ONTARIO (ALL-ITEMS) CPI Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
